Exit is a very minimalistic yet challenging two-dimensional strategy game!
Your goal is it to maneuver every snake into one goal by swiping either UP, DOWN, LEFT or RIGHT.

Have fun!

Exit is a level based game with currently 100 unique levels. Each level features a different game field as well as multiple snakes that can be controlled by the player. It is your objective to manoeuvre every snake into one goal by only using swipes.
A swipe is a simple gesture that can be performed by swiping across the screen from left to right, top to bottom, right to left or bottom to top. But beware you may only control all snakes collectively. This means if you swipe up, all snakes that have an empty block above their head will move upwards.

The ultimate goal is it to manoeuvre every snake into one goal by using as little swipes as necessary, without getting stuck on the way there. Not getting stuck sounds pretty easy, but as you progress through different levels you will notice that often a certain swipe is going to place a snake in a dead end or tangled in itself/another snake.

Rating us on the Google Play Store is highly appreciated!

How do you drown a hipster?\n\nThrow him in the mainstream.
What do computers snack on?\n\nMicrochips.
Why can\'t you trust an atom?\n\nBecause they make up literally everything.
What did the blanket say as it fell off the bed?\n\nOh sheet!
I like to spend every day as if it\'s my last.\n\nStaying in bed an calling for a nurse to bring me more pudding.
What do sea monsters eat?\n\nFish and ships.
What did the tomato say to the other tomato during a race?\n\nKetchup.
What has four wheels and flies?\n\nA garbage truck.
What\'s black, red, black, red, black, red?\n\nA zebra with a sun burn.
Why is Perter Pan always flying?\n\nHe Neverlands.
\"Nothing is impossible, the word itself says \'I\'m possible\'!\"\n\n-Audrey Hepburn
\"Try not to become a man of success, but rather try to become a man of value.\"\n\n-Albert Einstein
\"Everybody is a genius. But if you judge a fish by its ability to climb a tree, it will live its whole life believing that it is stupid.\"\n\n-Albert Einstein
\"Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change.\"\n\n-Stephen Hawking
\"Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.\"\n\n-Margaret Mead

Oh, hello there! Use your finger to swipe across the screen. From top to bottom, left to right, bottom to top or right to left in order to control the snake. Your objective is it to move the snake into the yellow goal block!
THANK YOU! Thank you for playing my game, it truly means a lot to me that you have reached this far.

As you can see here you can have multiple snakes in each level. Each snake moves in the same direction as you swipe. You win this level as soon as both snakes are in a goal. Also, you can use other snakes to block the movement of certain snakes. Try swiping right 2 times.
